content.body:
Update demo app to:
- Render a QR with <SmartQRCode />
- Link it to /r route with rules JSON
- Allow scanning from another device and show resolved action
- Include example with OS/lang/date conditions
content.title: Demo: integrate <SmartQRCode /> + resolver

content.body:
Create a React hook that:
- Accepts a SmartQR payload or URL
- Runs resolveAndExecute on mount or manually
- Returns status, matched rule, and error if any
- Add minimal unit tests
content.title: React: implement useSmartQR hook

content.body:
Write basic end-to-end tests that:
- Generate a QR with rollout/lang/os rules
- Serve it via demo resolver
- Open in headless browser with different UA strings
- Validate correct redirect/fallback
content.title: Core: basic E2E tests for rules + resolver
